title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog opens and immediately closes. Eventually, the exception list comes up, ignoring the cancellation request.
EB: The progress dialog should remain open until the user's cancellation request is honored. Additionally, the cancel button should either be disabled or the 'cancellable' parameter in ProgressMonitorDialog.run should be set as false.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Navigate to the breakpoints section
3. Add an exception breakpoint
4. Observe that the progress dialog opens and immediately closes
5. Eventually, the exception list appears, ignoring the cancellation request
